name: Mannequin Academy
description:
Join Aura, an orphan omega, as he gets accepted to the mysterious Mannequin Academy and tries to become what no one believed he could - a master of his own fate.

But not everything is what it seems. An old theatre, a cursed stage play, faces from the past erased by time...

Discover dark secrets that lurk underneath and make difficult choices in this unforgettable visual novel game that will shake you to the core.
